name: Let there be chaos, ok?
description:
The Devil himself, sent you to grocery store... (I don't know why), and you have to make enough chaos, to not be sent to hell?(doesn't make sense), but there's limited time, so better hurry.

Note: This game is bad, first time doing game jam, and am such a fucking procrastinator. 

Mr. Brackeys... am so sorry. I failed you. Am not worthy of your tutorials.

It doesn't even work, fuck Unity.
